title: eBikeGo acquires manufacturing, marketing rights for European e-scooter Muvi from Torrot
description: It has a portable battery, allowing consumers to conveniently swap them at stations. Designed in Europe and having been accepted by 14 established e-commerce and shared mobility companies, Muvi is set to provide users with all the advantages of an EV more securely and conveniently, ebikeGo said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
